Name: No Stone Unturned
About the game: Day 1, 7:48 You close the drawers and get the car keys off the desk. The first delivery's not far from here - hopefully you won't waste too much time in traffic. Day █, 18:32 Sal pours you another Conviction, as you mentally map out the gathered clues. Visit to █████'s place yielded more questions than answers - who's involved? And why? You shrug, waving away cigarette smoke with your hand. Someone in this damn city knows something about ███'s disappearance... and you won't stop short of finding them. In NSU, the mystery unfolds along your choices. You might follow the story, or simply do your job - as a Courier. The city presents you with several paths: - branching dialogues, - scenes reacting to your actions... and the influence of drugs, - a number of endings and varying ways of reaching them. However, keep in mind that time flies - and different opportunities arise and disappear.  Now, just your signature here: _____________
